# sakura_dedicated_storage (Data Source)

Get information about an existing Dedicated Storage contract.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_dedicated_storage" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the Dedicated Storage.
- `name` (String) The name of the Dedicated Storage.
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the Dedicated Storage.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the Dedicated Storage.
- `icon_id` (String) The icon id attached to the Dedicated Storage
